name: Bullet Glide
description:
Move your bullet with the mouse, and glide using left-click (M1). Survive for points, and dash through the static for bonus points. Press Esc to close out of the game.

Runs on Windows only.

If you've got a high score you're particularly proud of, share it in the comments below! The game will save your highest score.

Game created by Zachary Talis, January 2019.
